message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high quality and unique features, I would like to propose a price of $100 for it. I'm confident this investment will pay off in terms of both functionality and value. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'd like to get closer to my target price. Can you meet me halfway?
